title: Next WildFly Mini Conference
content: The WildFly team organizes the next WildFly mini conference. It will take place on Wednesday, November 20, 2024. It starts at 14:00 UTC and includes four sessions with topics related to WildFly. All sessions will be streamed live on YouTube.  For more information, please take a look at the conference page at  Weâ€™re looking forward to seeing you there!
